text: In C# we can do this:

code:
int i = 5;
		int ii = 10;
		if(i == 5 && ii == 10) {
			Console.WriteLine("i is 5, and ii is 10");

		}
		Console.ReadKey(true);

i = 5
                 ii = 10
                 if i == 5 & ii == 10:
                          print "i is 5 and ii is 10";

text: But this doesn't print out "i is 5 and ii is 10".
